__e: But Mr. Blair, he told us, he told President Jefferson Davis that we...
Remember the look on Jefferson Davis' face when he said:
Now, your daddy knows that what I want in return for all the help I can give him is to go down to Richmond, like he said I could as soon as Savannah fell and talk to Jefferson Davis.
I think most people would agree I'm a pretty likeable kid... but for some reason, I've never clicked with Mr. Jefferson.
Well, I feel like there might be some answers at the Jefferson Institute, and I can't even get in there.
Jefferson's the name, and I'm a man who travels and sees much, and I know the man who can do what you want... bring back the dead.
